reviews.title: I may just need to purchase another next month!
reviews.review_text: I bought these shelves for my bedroom to hold medical equipment and supplies I need at the ready day and night. I had no idea it would turn out so sturdy. The key is the direction (up or down) each shelf faces. We put it together originally so that there would be a lip on each level..not allowing things to fall off. That's the wrong way. there's a locking mechanism when placed the other way that assures strength! If I buy another, it will go in my living room. It's elegant enough to be right in front of my window and hold my plants!

reviews.title: Good but I should have checked measurements first
reviews.review_text: Nice Shelf. I bought it to put banker boxes on it, and should have been more careful. Only 2 banker boxes can fit per shelf, and this unit would be so much more useful if it was 5 shelf instead of 4. you need to spread the shelves so each has a lot of space above it. My bad - great deal but should have picked a better fit for my needs.

wasn't hard to put together. works for what we needed. supports are plastic so not sure if it will hold a lot of weight. the caps- some work. some don't but we don't really need them. bottom supports aren't bigger than round supports so might not be great on uneven surfaces. but for price it's ok.. in our garage just to put smaller items on.

Pros: easy assembly customizable shelf height style lends itself to modular set up. adequate for intended use of window plant shelf. cons: miss advertised as heavy duty and 1000lb capacity. I bet the fine print on that is 1000 overall. and they might be stretching on it. the shelves bend with just a bit of leaning weight to assemble. probably about 60 to 100 lbs of pressure. I have others of this style and they are very sturdy, can hold a 250 lb person per shelf. this one cannot. also the depth is closer to 13 inches than 12. I was expecting under 12.
I like it for storage, but it does bow in the middle with canned groceries stored on it, has the ability to possibly collapseing with to much stored on it
Easy, just have to make sure which way is top and which way is bottom, because, when you attach the connectors they will only fit one way inside the shelving.

reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect size
reviews.review_text: There should be a note that the clasps will not fit perfectly, but be a bit wider on one side. This is so that when you slip the shelf on it there would be a snug fit. It's not a defect.
The storage shelving unit is sturdy and easy to assemble, but the wires for shelving are too wide apart, causing a storage problem for smaller items.

reviews.title: Decent for the on-sale cost.
reviews.review_text: One of the shelves arrived bent. I have metal working tools and decided to straighten it rather than return, as I had already assembled most of the shelf when I discovered the damage.

reviews.title: Sturdy enough
reviews.review_text: It ain't pretty, but it serves its purpose. I purchased this bad boy to put it up in the guest room closet for food storage (for when shtf prep, war, whatever, you know, panic buying when tariff threats happened)! So, it's holding cans, rice and dried beans in Mylar bags with the oxygen absorbers, etc. would work good for garage crap, office crap, you name it crap!! Sturdy enough

Easy to put together holds a lot of weight it can fit in just about any room. I actually use it to store my extra stuff like extra toilet paper extra paper towels, small items like birthday presents things like that that I have extra and I keep it in the other room

reviews.title: Nice Lighter Duty Shelf Set
reviews.review_text: opened the box to look but did not actually assemble. However the assembly instructions said “Holds up to 250 Lb per shelf ‘Evenly Distributed'. Which lead to kind of a question as to the thickness and sturdiness of the shelving. I'm sure it's adequate for some uses, but I wanted a little more robust shelving for the garage.

reviews.title: Open the box
reviews.review_text: Stored box until I had time, no damage to box. Opened said box, pulled the first 2 shelves out and cut strap for legs and out pops several broken washers

I pushed the BestOffice 4 shelf for it to go in the bedroom . It fits in the spot where I needed it to go. I also purchased 4 -20gal tubs, it will hold 12 -20 gal tubs. I use them for yarn. My cat runs and hides under the bottom shelf when the other cats are chasing her. They just look around trying to find her, they haven't figured it out yet.

reviews.title: Not Very Heavy Duty
reviews.review_text: Never pay full price for this shelf unit and you might want to invest in a shelving material like 1/4" plywood or something of that nature (if your intentions are heavy items) to provide more shelf support, the wire shelving is quite light duty, but the unit is still functional as a moderate adjustable shelving unit. 1000 Lbs. good luck.

Each of my closets had only 1 shelf. There was a lot of space for adding shelves. Since I was living in a rental, I didn't want to add expensive shelves I would have to leave. The shelving unit gave me the shelves I needed and I can take them with me should I move. They also look great in my closets.
One shelf was dented. I decided to keep it anyway since I was only going to use it downstairs for storage.
says it's pretty sturdy, would hold plenty of weight, but after assembly, I'm not sure i would want to place that much upon it. So i haven't tried. Is light, easy to move around .

I ordered twice and received two on consecutive days, but a few days later I received another one but did not order it. So you can let me know when you want to pick it up and make sure I am not billed for the third one. Thank you.
We tried to put it together with the two plastic things you're supposed to snap together. One side comes off you tighten that side. The other side comes off.

reviews.title: I haven't had time to assemble the shelves yet
reviews.review_text: I haven't had time to assemble the shelves. Everyone wants an instant review. So everything I've written is just me hoping for the best.

reviews.title: Different uses for a Storage rack
reviews.review_text: This is my 3rd storage sleeve I've ordered in the last 4 months. They are used for different things like for extra food pantry, kitchen appliances, and clothes rack.

reviews.title: That's a high load rating.
reviews.review_text: For the price it's good. Just need to understand the weight used to test these things is very evenly distributed across the whole shelf. Put the whole weight in the middle and it's definitely going to sag.
I thought I ordered the silver one. I have had these shelfs for many years they last a very long time. I will reorder in silver, but I also need another blk.

reviews.title: It'll do. Just do your homework before ordering.
reviews.review_text: Not quite as heavy duty as I expected. There are so different variations of these products, make sure to check dimensions and capacities before ordering.
Is a necessity in the kitchen, will be getting more. Can choose how far apart or close together you want the racks, depending on what your using it for, easily hang things,kitchen tools etc.
